scenario2.name: Warning Does NOT Block Execution
scenario2.notes: RUN button is DISABLED (warning is incorrectly blocking)

scenario3.name: Error DOES Block Execution
scenario3.notes: RUN button is DISABLED (error correctly blocks)

scenario4.name: Empty Query (Prereq) Blocks Execution
scenario4.notes: RUN button is DISABLED (empty query correctly blocks)

scenario5.name: Valid Query Allows Execution
scenario5.notes: RUN button is DISABLED (valid query is incorrectly blocked)
